Text:
If you look around on the net you can find the following about this version:
"We tagged this as BDRip, because source is from an Russian Bluray. Audio is from iMAGINE and synced by PRiSM, both THNX. Its still a LiNE audio, dont think its retail."

So sounds (and looks) like the video is from a Russian BDRip and the audio from a DVDscr (synced correct). So event though the video quality is very good - the audio is still crap.

Fuck nothing, people download and watch TS, screeners, cams etc all the time... if this is awesome video quality then its a good download for some people.

Thank you bone for the upload.
480p shouldn't be classified as a brrip. The picture is no sharper than a standard dvd release.
if u want 2 watch it in the best quality pay 2 see it in the cinemas n stop moaning about summet u getting 4 free visons the 1 who made the video and named it i just uploaded

Fuck you all fucking spoiled brats!! You don't have a clue about how spoiled you really are do you? When I was a kid all we had was fucking Malaysian vhs rips! If you only knew.. Hope the fucking police bust your fucking ungrateful butts! FU!

Herbjon is from a long line of asian pirates.  We shoul respect our elders.  Hes kind of right though, when I was a kid I used to watch the wonder years I recorded on vhs in the lowest quality.  Shit was gangster back in the day.

why the fuck are people complaining, it's in the NAME BDRip & LINE,, as in LINE AUDIO.. you stupid fucks.. 

then in the description he wrote it was the 193kbps imagine-prism line audio.. he even told you what the source line was... you're all dumb shits for complaining,, there's no difference between you ungratefull assholes saying shit about this upload and others complaining a TS isn't DVDrip quality..... go shut the fuck up.
video =BDrip
audio =line
says so in the title. gfys
and chenz85, most dvd rips are cut at below 480p final resolution... you can shut up too.

I'm Swedish and my Malaysian import remark was to illustrate what we had to choose from as of new stuff that hadn't hit the movies or shelves yet.. I mean, wtf? These imports almost had sound, and the quality of the picture was like, grainy blobs moving around somewhere in there..

So just stfu or go back to the 80's and feel the heat!
thanks. yes the audio is not DVD quality, but the video is excellent
